pageContent: Objectives: To report 8 cases of rectourethral fistula (RUF) in patients treated with high-intensity focused ultrasound (HIFU) for either localized or locally recurrent prostate cancer (PCa).

metaData.source:
High Intensity Focused Ultrasound is a Good Treatment Option for Localized Prostate Cancer: Pro
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/27638337/
